name: Tweetery
description:
You decide what posts will be promoted or deleted at social media page Tweetery!

This interactive game was made for GDS Game Jam in 2020. The theme was Disinformation and Conspiracy theory - we decided to make a story game where YOU control the biggest social media page. Do you support the freedom of speech for everyone? Or will you censor some posts and accounts? But you have to be quick and careful at the same time - Every action has consequences! There are 13 endings in general and not all of them are positive! 

Controls :

Mouse
Green button - Promote the post
Gray button - Keep the post as it is
Red button - Delete and censor the post

Made with: daryanin
